doc.name: iphoneGetNotificationBadgeValue
doc.summary: Returns the value to which the application badge value is set.

description.overview: Use the iphoneGetNotificationBadgeValue function to return the badge value of the application.
description.value: The iphoneGetNotificationBadgeValue function returns the badge value of the application. If the value is positive, then the bade is displayed on the application, if the value is 0 (zero), then the badge is not displayed.
